Config.desc: Specify the config file or preset to load
Config.remark: The file will be searched according to the order shown by "fastfetch --list-config-paths". Use "none" to disable further config loading. See also https://github.com/fastfetch-cli/fastfetch/wiki/Configuration for more info

Logo.desc: Set the logo source. Use "none" to disable the logo
Logo.remark: Should be the name of a built-in logo or a path to an image file. See also https://github.com/fastfetch-cli/fastfetch/wiki/Logo-options

Logo.desc: Set the type of the logo specified in "--logo"

enum.auto: If something is given, first try built-in, then file. Otherwise detect logo
enum.file: Text file, printed with color code replacement
enum.data: Text data, printed with color code replacement
enum.sixel: Image file, printed as sixel codes
enum.kitty: Image file, printed using kitty graphics protocol
enum.kitty-direct: Image file, tells the terminal emulator to read image data from the specified file
enum.kitty-icat: Image file, uses `kitten icat` to display the image. Requires binary `kitten` to be installed
enum.iterm: Image file, printed using iterm graphics protocol
enum.chafa: Image file, printed as ASCII art using libchafa
enum.raw: Image file, printed as raw binary string
